entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intermittent ILVerify behavior in NumericIntPtrTests.ConstantFolding_01 #63782
  • Could not load System.Collections.Immutable #63780
  • RunTests should not write response files to repo root #63779
  • Add ReportDiagnostic API to all initial transform APIs #63776
  • Integration test process crashes #63773
  • Integration tests timing out after 150 minutes #63772
  • VSIX fails to install on DartLab integration pipeline #63770
  • Required member nullable warnings are not restored when missing `: base()` on a `[SetsRequiredMember]` constructor #63768
    17.4
  • Convert-to-Postfix Refactoring #63767
    Backlog
  • Error overriding a method with an implicitly scoped parameter with -langversion:10 #63761

Closed

  • CS0540 partial type with generic base does not implement interface #63490
    17.4
  • New Inline Rename Checkboxes close session when clicked #63676
    17.4
  • C# 11 Generic Attributes do not allow for generic constructor arguments #63781
  • Prevent analyzer/generator authors from using banned APIs #63290
    17.4
  • Include and suggest Microsoft.Data.SqlClient in Visual Studio Intellisense suggestion list #53736
  • Holding CTRL does not always produce navigatable targets #63694
    17.4
  • conversion from block namespace to inline delete commented code #63769
    17.4
  • No way to annotated a required member that must be set in a derived class #63766

PullRequests

Created

  • Get pipelineid from env vars #63785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE
  • Restore live update behavior in new inline rename #63783
    Area-IDE
  • Better error recovery when 'readonly' is used as a parameter modifier #63777
    Area-Compilers
  • Upgrade NuPkg references #63764
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Revert "Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing ass… #63763
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Ensure we do not drop interfaces on partial type declarations when bases have oblivious differences #63778
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use IsKeyboardFocusWithin instead of FocusLost #63705
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Capture dotnet test dumps and fix integration test timeout #63774
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Always include packages above a minimum popularity threshold #63775
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid reporting `scoped` differences for delegate conversions #63771
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unify implementation of 'go to defintion' and 'go to definition on hover' #63703
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix ordering of code fixes #63747
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prioritize results from the current document if all other things are equal in a nav-to result #63709
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Collect information to help track down a crash. #63743
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add feature to recommend making a struct 'readonly' when all its fields are already readonly. #63668
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update the DartLab Template branch to main #63707
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not report NFW for expected clipboard exception #63755
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Method group defaults #63673
    Area-Compilers
  • Upgrade NuPkg references #63765
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove unused extension method #63762
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Set diagnostic identifier to allow the platform to merge diagnostics from linked docs #63748
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Fix post init trees parsing when parse options change #61934
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Priority:0, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Make ISupportedChangesService api public #63752
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid having to take locks repeatedly when cleaning out workspace #62986
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Enable GeneratedFilesOut for VB #63759
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60614
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor runtests #63714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE
